00072 // ===========================================================================
00073 // functions
00074 // ===========================================================================
00075 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076  * data processing methods
00077  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00081 MSNet*
00082 load(OptionsCont& oc) {
00083     MSFrame::setMSGlobals(oc);
00084     MSVehicleControl* vc = 0;
00085 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00086     if (MSGlobals::gUseMesoSim) {
00087         vc = new MEVehicleControl();
00088     } else {
00089 #endif
00090     vc = new MSVehicleControl();
00091 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00092 }
00093 #endif
00094     MSNet* net = new MSNet(vc, new MSEventControl(), new MSEventControl(),
00095             new MSEventControl());
00096     NLEdgeControlBuilder eb;
00097     NLDetectorBuilder db(*net);
00098     NLJunctionControlBuilder jb(*net, db);
00099     NLTriggerBuilder tb;
00100     NLHandler handler("", *net, db, tb, eb, jb);
00101     tb.setHandler(&handler);
00102     NLBuilder builder(oc, *net, eb, jb, db, handler);
00103     if (!builder.build()) {
00104         delete net;
00105         throw ProcessError();
00106     }
00107     return net;
00108 }
00109 
00110 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111  * main
00112  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00113 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00114     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00115     // give some application descriptions
00116     oc.setApplicationDescription("A microscopic road traffic simulation.");
00117     oc.setApplicationName("sumo",
00118             "SUMO sumo Version " + (std::string) VERSION_STRING
00119                     + " adapted by the HI-Iberia");
00120     int ret = 0;
00121     MSNet* net = 0;
00122     try {
00123         // Initialize subsystems
00124         XMLSubSys::init(false);
00125         MSFrame::fillOptions();
00126         OptionsIO::getOptions(true, argc, argv);
00127         if (oc.processMetaOptions(argc < 2)) {
00128             SystemFrame::close();
00129             return 0;
00130         }
00131         MsgHandler::initOutputOptions();
00132         if (!MSFrame::checkOptions()) {
00133             throw ProcessError();
00134         }
00135         RandHelper::initRandGlobal();
00136         // load the net
00137         net = load(oc);
00138         std::cout << "Loading extra-file: " << oc.getString("extra-file") << "\n";
00139         std::string simulFile = oc.getString("extra-file");
00140         ScenParser* parser = new ScenParser(simulFile.c_str());
00141         if (net != 0) {
00142             SUMOTime begin = string2time(oc.getString("begin"));
00143             SUMOTime end = string2time(oc.getString("end"));
00144             // report the begin when wished
00145             WRITE_MESSAGE(
00146                     "Simulation started with time: " + time2string(begin));
00147             // simulate
00148             ret = net->simulate(begin, end);
00149             // report the end when wished
00150             WRITE_MESSAGE(
00151                     "Simulation ended at time: " + time2string(net->getCurrentTimeStep()));
00152         }
00153         //delete parser;
00154     } catch (ProcessError& e) {
00155         if (std::string(e.what()) != std::string("Process Error")
00156                 && std::string(e.what()) != std::string("")) {
00157             WRITE_ERROR(e.what());
00158         }
00159         MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->inform("Quitting (on error).", false);
00160         ret = 1;
00161 #ifndef _DEBUG
00162     } catch (...) {
00163         MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->inform("Quitting (on unknown error).",
00164                 false);
00165         ret = 1;
00166 #endif
00167     }
00168     delete net;
00169     OutputDevice::closeAll();
00170     SystemFrame::close();
00171     return ret;
00172 }
